content:
In a Magic the Gathering "mini" set containing 30 new cards, the number of cards of each type will vary depending on the specific theme and mechanics of the set. Here is a rough estimate of the number of cards of each type that might be found in a "mini" set:

* Creatures: 10-15
* Instants: 5-10
* Sorceries: 5-10
* Enchantments: 5-10
* Artifacts: 5-10
* Planeswalkers: 1-5
* Lands: 5-10

It's worth noting that these are just rough estimates, and the actual number of cards of each type in a "mini" set can vary widely. The proportions of the different card types may also vary depending on the specific themes and mechanics of the set.

I hope this information helps to give you an idea of the number of cards of each type that might be found in a Magic the Gathering "mini" set. Please let me know if you have any further questions.
